name: Espresso
description: Intense and rich coffee brewed by forcing hot water under pressure through finely-ground coffee beans.

name: Cappuccino
description: Espresso mixed with steamed milk and topped with a thick layer of milk foam.

name: Latte
description: Creamy espresso-based drink made with steamed milk and a small amount of foam.

name: Mocha
description: Espresso combined with steamed milk, chocolate syrup, and topped with whipped cream.

name: Americano
description: Diluted espresso with hot water, resulting in a similar strength to regular coffee but with a different flavor profile.

name: Macchiato
description: Espresso with a small amount of steamed milk, creating a bold coffee flavor with a touch of creaminess.

name: Flat White
description: Similar to a latte but with a higher ratio of coffee to milk, resulting in a stronger coffee flavor.

name: Affogato
description: A dessert-style coffee made by pouring hot espresso over a scoop of vanilla ice cream.

name: Irish Coffee
description: Hot coffee mixed with Irish whiskey, sugar, and topped with cream, typically served in a glass mug.

name: Iced Coffee
description: Chilled coffee served over ice, perfect for hot summer days.

name: Matcha Green Tea
description: Our Matcha is a pure plant product made from Ceremonial Grade A, 100% Japanese green tea that is smooth and delicious.

name: Vanilla Matcha Green Tea
description: Our Matcha is a pure plant product made from Ceremonial Grade A, 100% Japanese green tea that is smooth and delicious.

name: Mango Matcha Green Tea
description: Our Matcha is a pure plant product made from Ceremonial Grade A, 100% Japanese green tea that is smooth and delicious.

name: Chocolate Matcha Green Tea

name: Vanilla Blend
description: This medium roast brew is light, delicious and dreamy, with hints of Madagascar vanilla and roasted nuts.

name: Social dog blend
description: Each blend features a unique animal inspired by the characteristics of the coffee.

name: Early Bird blend
description: Each blend features a unique animal inspired by the characteristics of the coffee.

name: Espresso blend
description: Each blend features a unique animal inspired by the characteristics of the coffee.

name: Original Family blend

name: Hazelnut blend

name: Yellow Double Wall Mug
description: Introducing an exclusive, limited-edition accessory for your daily routine. This colorful cup is fancy and functional, with extra insulation keeping your favorite beverage warm all day long.

name: Cupcake
description: Indulge in our delectable cupcakes, each lovingly crafted with the finest ingredients and attention to detail. Perfect for satisfying your sweet cravings or celebrating special occasions, our cupcakes are sure to delight your taste buds. From classic flavors like chocolate and vanilla to unique creations like red velvet and salted caramel, there's something for everyone to enjoy.

name: Muffin Ganache Buttercream
description: The Muffin Ganache Buttercream is a delectable treat consisting of a moist muffin base topped with a layer of indulgent chocolate ganache and finished with a creamy buttercream frosting.

name: Chocolate brownie
description: A chocolate brownie is a rich and decadent dessert made with chocolate, butter, sugar, eggs, and flour. It has a dense, fudgy texture and a deep chocolate flavor.

name: Cheesecake Cuisine Recipe
description: Creamy cheesecake made with cream cheese, sugar, and eggs on a graham cracker crust.

name: Mini Cake
description: Kazandibi is loved for its creamy texture, rich flavor, and the contrast between the smooth pudding and the caramelized bottom layer. It's a comforting and indulgent dessert that is enjoyed throughout Turkey and in many other countries where Turkish cuisine is appreciated.

name: Waffles with Fresh Strawberries
description: reat yourself to a delicious stack of golden waffles topped with ripe, juicy strawberries. Our fluffy waffles are made to order, perfectly crisp on the outside and fluffy on the inside. Each bite is a delightful combination of warm, buttery waffles and the natural sweetness of fresh strawberries. Whether you're starting your day off right or indulging in a leisurely brunch, our waffles with fresh strawberries are sure to satisfy your cravings and leave you craving more.
